channel.title: Dragon Claws in PI
channel.description:
first download this UppIT - Free File hosting - EquipmentEditor.jar and put it on \Data\data open the jar when u putted it there item id to edit is 14484 then click change then load and last save.. then close it then open combatassistant search for case 11694: // ags under the break; add this code. [code]case 14484: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(6000); c.specDamage = 1.25; c.specAccuracy = 1.85; c.gfx0(-1); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquip ment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;[/code] kwl. lets then search for public boolean checkSpecAmount(int weapon) { and add this case 14484: close it & save it then open itemassistant and search for case 1305: // dragon long under that add case 14484: then search for [code]if (itemName.contains("godsword") || itemName.contains("aradomin sword") || itemName.contains("2h") || itemName.contains("spear")){ return true; }[/code] then reaplace it with if (itemName.contains("godswor - Anonymous - XccrbZUH - Pastebin.com then open cfg item cfg and add this item = 14484 Dragon_claws Swap - Anonymous - zQ6mBuGG - Pastebin.com then close it client side. if you got slashscape you cant add it .. open itemdef and add this [code]if(i == 14484) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); }[/code] kk now add these models Dragon Claw Models.rar
Ok I follow it all correctly and when I log in and type add model to add the 2 models it says it cannot find the models. The models are in the Raw folder. I get on my RSPS and spawn the Dragon Claws. They are invisible and they go on the head :/

item.title: Dragon Claws in PI
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

DannyIsSoPro:

Hmm,try putting the raws in the cache if you have one,and for the head equip bull crap,I have a program that lets you edit dats in the server and change were they are worn if u need it

Yeah it’s the equipment.dat editor Let me Try it again but ill try to put the Raw folder in the cache

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws in PI
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

first download this

UppIT - Free File hosting - EquipmentEditor.jar

and put it on \Data\data

open the jar when u putted it there item id to edit is 14484 then click change then load and last save… then close it

then open combatassistant

search for case 11694: // ags

under the break; add this code.

case 14484: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(6000); c.specDamage = 1.25; c.specAccuracy = 1.85; c.gfx0(-1); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquip ment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;
kwl. lets

then search for public boolean checkSpecAmount(int weapon) {
and add this

case 14484:

close it & save it

then open itemassistant and search for

case 1305: // dragon long

under that add

case 14484:

then search for

if (itemName.contains("godsword") || itemName.contains("aradomin sword") || itemName.contains("2h") || itemName.contains("spear")){ return true; }

then reaplace it with

if (itemName.contains("godswor - Anonymous - XccrbZUH - Pastebin.com

then open cfg item cfg

and add this

item = 14484 Dragon_claws Swap - Anonymous - zQ6mBuGG - Pastebin.com

then close it

client side. if you got slashscape you cant add it …

open itemdef and add this

if(i == 14484) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); }

kk
now add these models

Dragon Claw Models.rar

Ok I follow it all correctly and when I log in and type add model to add the 2 models it says it cannot find the models. The models are in the Raw folder. I get on my RSPS and spawn the Dragon Claws. They are invisible and they go on the head
